title: no se habre faceboock en el navegador.
content: Como puedo resolver el problema de faceboock en el navegador, que no se abre.
creator: josecesargutierrezgonzalez469

title: Transmitting order instructions to broker
content:
Here is a message I have sent my broker --

I have complained previously about Commsec not accepting instructions from browsers. Firefox is the worst, but Chrome and Edge are also affected. Stopping and re-running the browser helps. Only trading instructions are affected. Up to now, that is : Firefox has now started occasionally failing with less sensitive instructions. In fact Firefox is now so bad that I must use only Chrome. I don't know where the fault lies -- broker, browser, me or all of us. Thanks if you would convey this issue to your software team.

Possibly the problem lies with overly tight security somewhere in the communication. What do you think?
creator: eagerd

title: Repeated notices about updates, are they not completing?
content: Almost every time I start Thunderbird it says I have to restart to complete an update. It seems to be in an update "loop". It advises an update is available but it's 102.2.0 which is already installed! And this interference perhaps is causing the program lock up when I delete some read messages, so the only way out is a shutdown via Task Manager.
creator: bwfairhall

title: Hotkeys messed up or broken
content:
I've lost the ability to use site-based hotkey shortcuts. For example, if I pull up Google Docs, if I type a statement and try to bolden the text with Ctrl + B, I get the Bookmark sidebar instead. Ctrl + I for italics? Instead I get page info. Ctrl + U to underline? Instead I get a wall of coding. This issue is a consistent thing on all websites, for a variety of hotkey commands.

I can't find where I can change, or turn off hotkeys in general, the last three hours of scouring the internet, including the FF forums, have been no help. I can't tell if this is a setting I can't find, I change with an update, but whatever it is, it needs to be reverted. I'd very much prefer not to switch browsers over an issue that should be a changeable setting.
creator: aaron.pounds91

title: Facebook Container isn't working
content:
Facebook Container isn't working, i have followed the what to do if Facebook Container isn't working suggestions. but it does not fix it. If i hover / right click on the "+" to open a new tab i do not get a new container menu. In customise toolbar there is not a facebook container icon/button (fence icon) to place on my toolbar. when i goto facebook there is no fence icon in the address bar. This is in Windows 10 (all updates done) Firefox is up to date, addons are all upto date. I uninstalled it, restarted firefox and reinstalled it, but it still didn't work. I disabled all my addons restarted Firefox and enabled facebook container, but it still didn't work. As i re-enabled all of my other addons i noticed that the following addons also do not work or have buttons on the toolbar and do not appear on the customise toolbar page. ClearURLs ColorfulTabs Don't Accept image/webp Firefox Relay FoxClocks Video DownloadHelper WebP/Avif image converter

These are all working on my Windows 8.1 computer. I hope someone can help me fix this. Thank you Steve PS Noscript, Adblockplus, privacy badger and Easy Youtube Video Downloader Express are all working
creator: benson.home3

title: Some characters don't display properly; troubleshoot mode fixes, but …
content:
Hi, some Unicode characters are displaying as boxes. This has been going on for a while. When I restart in troubleshoot mode, the problem goes away (see first image I've attached). And I do normally use several extensions that might cause problems here, e.g. NoScript (although I've checked that font blocking is off).

  • But* when I restart in normal mode with all my extensions and plugins disabled, hardware acceleration off, and a default theme, the problem is still there (see second image). What else is troubleshoot mode disabling?

Thanks for any insights!
creator: abestone

title: Debian Corrompido
content: Após um travamento do debian linux o mesmo corrompeu o arquivo de inicialização tornando o sistema inutilizável, porém através de outra distro é possível fazer o acesso para backup, minha dúvida é onde se localiza os arquivos de sessão ativa, histórico, senhas e favoritos em linux para que o mesmo seja salva e ré-utilizado após recuperação do sistema?
creator: tecnofelipe
